key_risks: Legal and regulatory risks, including SEC investigation and lawsuit by Siemens
Supply chain vulnerabilities, particularly with lithium-ion batteries
High competitive pressures in the energy storage market
controversies: SEC investigation into potential securities law violations
Lawsuit by Siemens alleging engineering and design failures, false representations, and fraud
environmental_issues: Dependence on lithium-ion batteries, which have environmental and supply chain challenges
social_issues: Potential impact on investor confidence due to legal and financial controversies
governance_issues: Ongoing SEC investigation and internal audit concerns
Legal disputes with major shareholder Siemens
